::Abominus/Surgital::

    Abominus moved a little, but was still hit in th=
e head and chest by the missiles.  He stumbled back quite far actually, 5 s=
teps is kinda far for a gestalt to stumble back from a normal heighted warr=
ior's perspective.  Abominus snarled meanly at Galaxor, then fired 2 beams =
from the lazer from his lower chest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~
       Surgital heard the lightning bolt, and quickly turned around a=
nd side-stepped just in time to avoid the lightning bolt by a speck or two.=
  Then, Surgital converted his hand into a saw blade again, and this time s=
hot the saw blade at Lavatron's head.  (BTW, the blade was shot vertical, s=
o moving to the side gives a better chance of dodging it.)
